DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety of three doses of oxybutynin for the treatment of urge urinary incontinence.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Oxybutynin for the Treatment of Urge Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: Females 18 to 75 years of age Has reported symptoms of urge urinary incontinence/overactive bladder Is pregnant or lactating Has had lower urinary tract surgery within 6 months prior to Screening Has a history of urinary retention
